description: With the&nbsp;summer heat and sun, it's crucial to keep your skin protected. If you're looking for a cocktail that is good for your skin, look no further than the Grape Rosemary &amp; Gin Crush! This cocktail contains a potent antioxidant known as resveratrol, found in grapes, and shields your skin from sun damage and skin cancer.Grapes are also a powerhouse of Vitamins C &amp; K and essential minerals such as phosphorus, calcium, potassium. The seeds offer various rejuvenating properties that will help soothe away any signs of aging or dryness on the face. So don't forget to drink up this summer with this&nbsp;healthy cocktail!
keywords: Grape Rosemary & Gin Crush Cocktail Recipes
How To Grape Rosemary & Gin Crush
name: Grape Rosemary & Gin Crush
recipeIngredient: ½ cup Zinfandel grapes (or other purple-skinned grapes)

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker, mash the grapes, rosemary, and sugar.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, mash the grapes, rosemary, and sugar.

recipeInstructions.name: Add in the lemon juice, then the gin.
recipeInstructions.text: Add in the lemon juice, then the gin.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve.

recipeInstructions.name: Stir with ice, then strain into a glass filled with ice, and top off with a splash of sparkling water.
